org.sm.fraxion.fractals.util

Class ColoringParameters

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.sm.fraxion.fractals.util.ColoringParameters

  • public final class ColoringParameters
extends java.lang.Object
    The ColoringParameters class provides a container for holding a fractal's colouring parameters.

    Note that this class cannot be subclassed!

    Version:
    23/06/2015
    Author:
    Sven Maerivoet
